title: Disconnects and no Loss Prevented?
body: What the... My whole team continually disconnects so we lose the game. You guys have posted you are seeing elevated reports of disconnects and put a notification on the server, yet no Loss Prevented? Please explain. There are like 5 days left in the season, I need my LP.

replies.body:
Gawd, I know what you feel like. It must feel even more terrible if your in the heigher ranks. I'm in B5, and I have been disconnecting like the OP.
Rito, do something quick will ya? I want to get to silver you know -_-
